name: test_planning_v56
description: Detailed specification for generating a Project using Generative AI

plan_spec.target_audience: Beginners learning programming or Python for the first time
prerequisites: Basic understanding of what a programming language is
Python installed on the development machine
Familiarity with using an IDE or a code editor
scope: Printing output to console in Python
How to run a Python script
feature_set: Display the phrase 'Hello, World!' on the console

prerequisites: Install Python 3.8 or higher on local machine
Access to Visual Studio Code or similar code editor
learning_outcomes: Ability to write and execute a simple Python program
Confidence with the first basic programming task

acceptance_criteria: Program prints exactly 'Hello, World!' when executed.
Script runs without errors on a machine with Python 3.8+
Code is self-contained and does not require any external libraries
deliverables: Python (.py) source code file for Hello World application
README file with brief run instructions
Sample test output showing correct message
learning_outcomes: Understand how to write and run a simple Python script
First exposure to Python syntax for output
Achieve successful setup and first execution in Python
plan_spec.user_prompt: A simple hello world application in python
